title: Bug 12906 - Unable to Open File in Second Editor
description: Bug 12906 - If a file is already opened in one editor, it should give a warning when trying to open it in another editor, but currently it does not.
OB: Currently, when trying to open a file in a second editor that is already open in another editor, no warning or error message is displayed.
EB: However, there should be a warning or error message indicating that the file is already open in another editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a file in one editor.
2. Try to open the same file in a second editor.

Expected result: A warning or error message should be displayed indicating that the file is already open in another editor.
